AssociationStatus.markdownDescription:
---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Allowed Values: NOT_ASSOCIATED | PENDING_ASSOCIATION | ASSOCIATED_WITH_OWNER_ACCOUNT | ASSOCIATED_WITH_SHARED_ACCOUNT | PENDING_DISASSOCIATION  
Update requires: No interruption

---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Update requires: No interruption

ResourceId.markdownDescription:
---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Minimum Length: 1  
Maximum Length: 1000  
Pattern: .+  
Update requires: No interruption

ConnectionIdentifier.markdownDescription:
---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Minimum Length: 1  
Maximum Length: 20  
Pattern: ^[a-zA-Z0-9]+$  
Update requires: No interruption

---

Required: No  
Update requires: No interruption

---

Required: Yes

---

Required: Yes  
Type: String

Tag.markdownDescription:
---

Required: No

ConnectionString.markdownDescription:
---

Required: Yes  
Type: String  
Minimum Length: 1  
Maximum Length: 255  
Pattern: ^[.0-9a-zA-Z\-]{1,255}$

---
